00002  *******************************************************

00004  *              based on moog-variation2, musicdsp.org

00010 
00011 // Check against redundant including
00012 #ifndef TT_LOWPASS_FOURPOLE_H
00013 #define TT_LOWPASS_FOURPOLE_H
00014 
00015 // Include appropriate headers
00016 #include "tt_audio_base.h"
00017 
00018 
00019 /********************************************************
00020         CLASS INTERFACE/IMPLEMENTATION
00021 
00022         The entire class is implemented inline for speed.
00023  ********************************************************/
00024 
00025 class tt_lowpass_fourpole:public tt_audio_base{
00026 
00027         private:
00028                 tt_attribute_value              resonance;
00029                 tt_attribute_value              frequency;
00030                 double                                  c, res;                 // c = cutoff [0.0 to 1.0], res = resonance [0.0 to 4.0]
00031                 double                                  in[4], out[4];
00032                 double                                  f, fb;
00033         
00034         
00035         public:
00036                 enum selectors{                                                         
00037                         num_poles = 4,
00038                         
00039                         k_resonance,                                                    // Attribute Selectors
00040                         k_frequency
00041                 };
00042                 
00043 
00044                 // OBJECT LIFE                                  
00045                 tt_lowpass_fourpole()                                                           // Constructor          
00046                 {
00047                         set_attr(k_frequency, 4000.0);  
00048                         set_attr(k_resonance, 4.0);     
00049                         clear();
00050                 }
00051 
00052                 ~tt_lowpass_fourpole()                                                          // Destructor
00053                 {
00054                         ;
00055                 }
00056 
00057 
00058                 // ATTRIBUTES
00059                 void set_attr(tt_selector sel, tt_attribute_value val)  // Set Attributes
00060                 {
00061                         switch (sel){                   
00062                                 case k_frequency:
00063                                         frequency = val;
00064                                         c = (val * 2.0) / sr;
00065                                         f = c * 1.16;
00066                                         fb = res * (1.0 - 0.15 * (f * f));
00067                                         break;
00068                                 case k_resonance:
00069                                         resonance = val;
00070                                         res = 4.0 * (val * 0.1);
00071                                         fb = res * (1.0 - 0.15 * (f * f));                      
00072                                         break;
00073                         }
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 tt_attribute_value get_attr(tt_selector sel)                            // Get Attributes
00077                 {
00078                         switch (sel){
00079                                 case k_frequency:
00080                                         return frequency;
00081                                 case k_resonance:
00082                                         return resonance;
00083                                 default:
00084                                         return 0.0;
00085                         }
00086                 }
00087                 
00088                 
00089                 // DSP LOOP
00090                 void dsp_vector_calc(tt_audio_signal *input, tt_audio_signal *output)
00091                 {
00092                         tt_sample_value temp;
00093                         temp_vs = input->vectorsize;
00094                         
00095                         while(temp_vs--){
00096                                 temp = *input->vector++;
00097                                 
00098                                 temp -= anti_denormal(out[3] * fb); 
00099                                 temp *= anti_denormal(0.35013 * ((f * f) * (f * f))); 
00100                                 out[0] = anti_denormal(temp + 0.3 * in[0] + (1 - f) * out[0]); 
00101                                 in[0] = temp; 
00102                                 out[1] = anti_denormal(out[0] + 0.3 * in[1] + (1 - f) * out[1]); 
00103                                 in[1] = out[0]; 
00104                                 out[2] = anti_denormal(out[1] + 0.3 * in[2] + (1 - f) * out[2]); 
00105                                 in[2] = out[1]; 
00106                                 out[3] = anti_denormal(out[2] + 0.3 * in[3] + (1 - f) * out[3]); 
00107                                 in[3] = out[2]; 
00108                                 temp = out[3];
00109                                                                 
00110                                 *output->vector++ = temp;
00111                         }
00112                         input->reset(); output->reset();
00113                 }
00114 
00115 
00116                 // clear
00117                 void clear()
00118                 {
00119                         short i;
00120                         
00121                         for(i=0; i < num_poles; i++){
00122                                 in[i] = 0.0;
00123                                 out[i] = 0.0;
00124                         }
00125                 }
00126                 
00127 };
00128 
00129 
00130 #endif  // TT_LOWPASS_FOURPOLE_H
